title: Lucas Pontes
text:
Environmental Engineer with doctorate in Soil Science.
Fascinated by remote sensing and data science applied to agroindustry. I am currently a researcher in ​​applied forest management at Suzano.
I love learning, teaching and sharing ideas and knowledge. Therefore, I created this blog where I provide tutorials on geoprocessing with R and Python.
